description:
Senpai doesn’t have any confidence that he can win against the art club president. Nagatoro and the gang try to cheer him up, but the president’s art is just too powerful. Nagatoro offers to model for Senpai.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Senpai wa Dou Omottensuka? / Sunao ja Naindakaraa, Senpai waa
T`en penses quoi ? / T`es vraiment pas honnête
What Do You Think, Senpai? / You Could Be More Honest, Senpai
センパイはどう思ってんスか? / 素直じゃないんだからー, センパイはー♥
